title: Point of interest details
description: A point or place of interest (POI) Details. Used to capture the technical and metadata information for a POI.

xdm:POIID.title: POI identity
xdm:POIID.description: The unique identifier of the POI.

xdm:poiID.title: POI Identity
xdm:poiID.description: The unique identifier of the POI.

xdm:name.title: POI name
xdm:name.description: The name given to the POI.

xdm:category.title: POI category
xdm:category.description: General category assigned for organizing the POIs by the administrator of POI definitions.

xdm:type.title: POI type
xdm:type.description: The general type of the POI using a typing schema selected by the administrator of the POI definitions.

xdm:distanceToPOICenter.title: Distance to POI center
xdm:distanceToPOICenter.description: Estimated distance from the POI center in meters.

xdm:beaconInteractionDetails.title: Beacon interaction details
xdm:beaconInteractionDetails.description: Beacon details active for the POI interaction.

xdm:proximityUUID.title: Proximity UUID
xdm:proximityUUID.description: A proximity UUID (Universally Unique IDentifier) is a special type of identifier used to distinguish beacons in your network from all other beacons in networks outside your control. The proximity UUID is configured into a beacon, to be transmitted to mobile devices in range to identify an organizations beacons.

xdm:beaconMajor.title: Beacon major
xdm:beaconMajor.description: Major values identify and distinguish a group and unsigned integer values between 1 and 65,535.

xdm:beaconMinor.title: Beacon Minor
xdm:beaconMinor.description: Minor values identify and distinguish an individual and unsigned integer values between 1 and 65,535.

meta:enum.unknown: Not able to ascertain distance, signal likely very weak.

xdm:geoInteractionDetails.title: Geo interaction details
xdm:geoInteractionDetails.description: Geo details active for the POI interaction.

xdm:distanceToCenter.title: Distance to center
xdm:distanceToCenter.description: Distance to center of geo in, case of a geo circle, measured in meters.

xdm:deviceGeoAccuracy.title: Geo device accuracy
xdm:deviceGeoAccuracy.description: The accuracy of the geo measuring device or mechanism, measured in meters.

xdm:geoShape.title: Geo shape
xdm:geoShape.description: Geo shape of the geo being interacted with.
